data.title: Actress Susan St James and husband NBC Sports chief Dick Ebersol...
data.meta_description: Picture of Actress Susan St James and husband NBC Sports chief Dick Ebersol attend a private screening of Mean Girls with their son Edward Teddy Ebersol at Loews Lincoln Square Theater April 23 2004 in New York... WireImage
data.text:
Image:

#51803197

Caption:

NEW YORK - APRIL 23, 2004: (FILE PHOTO) Actress Susan St. James and husband, NBC Sports chief Dick Ebersol, attend a private screening of "Mean Girls" with their son Edward ``Teddy'' Ebersol at Loews Lincoln Square Theater April 23, 2004 in New York City. Teddy is missing and presumed dead in the fiery crash of a corporate jet that claimed the lives of two crew members November 28, 2004 at Montrose Regional Airport in southwest Colorado. Dick Ebersol and his oldest son Charles survived the crash. (Photo by Paul Hawthorne/Getty Images)

Headline:
